alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant; Richland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 11:39PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Clayton, Grant, Richland and southeastern Crawford Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Reedsburg to near Greeley. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cassville around 1205 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Iowa and southwestern Wisconsin.
